## Elegantica minimal Business Responsive Wordpress Theme

**Elegantica** is a responsive minimal **business Wordpress Theme**, suited for creative folk that wish to present their products or services with a bit of creativity. It is suited for both personal and corporate websites.

The Theme comes with a plethora of options so you can modify layout, styling, colors and fonts directly from within the backend of your **Wordpress Theme**. You can choose any color you want to be the Theme’s leading color (you can see 8 examples in our preview).

This **Business Wordpress theme** allows you to change all the main colors of the Theme (background color for titles, color of title fonts, color of hover elements, color of shadow used on text) along with the background. This means that you can change all the colors and looks of the theme with just a few clicks.

title: Akita Responsive WordPress Theme
content: Akita is clean and modern WordPress theme made for Business, Portfolio, Personal Blog or any kind of website.

title: Pagelines Framework 2.1.5 - Wordpress
content: This new release solves a ton of web design problems; for both beginners and professionals. It builds on the concept of drag and drop web design, and we really think it could change the way people build websites, forever. 2.0 contains over 50 new features. Everything from the new PageLines Store, to section cloning, responsive/mobile design, special page handling, new integrations, new admin UI, better meta controls, etc..

title: Bloom - Responsive Wordpress Theme
content: Bloom is a Premium Wordpress Theme, with a Clean and Modern OnePage design and Responsive Layout (work in all devices).Ideal for creatives, designers, artists, photographers, showcase your portfolio.

title: Alexia Castillo - Model Photography WP CMS
content: Alexia is a powerful and fully customizable WordPress theme – It includes powerful admin panel which gives you full control over every major and minor design element throughout your website. It comes with Shortcode Generator which will print the short code easily without hard code. This theme is highly flexible and created to be easily customized.

title: Capital - WooThemes Wordpress Template
content: Capital is a WooCommerce theme which has been designed specifically to sell digital products. There are options to strip functionality right back which makes this the perfect theme for boutique software agencies. Capital has also been fully optimised for use on hand-held, touch screen devices.

title: Aleph - Portfolio for Agencies and Freelancers
content: Aleph is a completely ajaxed, animated, bold, interactive and responsive fullwidth template that will suit all your needs, wether you are a freelancer, an agency or for any other use.

title: Chameleon - ElegantThemes Premium Wordpress Theme
content: Chameleons are known for their ability to change the color of their skin. The patterns and color combinations you find in chameleons are almost endless, and our new theme is no different! Chameleon was created to be a simple and professional theme with loads of customization options that do not require web development experience to utilize.

title: Choices - Responsive Business and Portfolio
content: Choices is a responsive WordPress Theme (try resizing your browser), suited for business websites and users who want to showcase their work on a neat portfolio site. The Theme is built on top of the fabulous Avia Framework and offers support for the WPML MULTI LANGUAGE plugin, just in case you need it.

title: Flexible - ElegantThemes Wordpress Template
content: Flexible is a sleek and minimal portfolio theme packed full of some awesome features. The theme puts your work first, keeping the design elements to a minimum while still maintaining a definitive modern style. With its filterable, ajax-powered multi-media gallery, Flexible is perhaps our most feature-rich gallery theme yet.

title: Nexus - Responsive Business WordPress Themeforest Theme
content: Nexus is a deeply responsive, business WordPress theme. Using the extensive Skin & Color Options you can completely change the look of your site in seconds. In addition to the extensive color options, you can use Nexus to integrate with the Google Font Directory. Using any of the hundreds of fonts offered by the Google Font Directory allows you to tailor your typography for a unique, custom look.

title: Travelous 1.2.0 - Colorlabsproject Wordpress Theme
content: One-of-a-kind WordPress travel blog theme for the world`s travelers, explorers and wanderers. Travelous helps you build a travel blog quickly and with ease.

title: Volumes: Responsive Portfolio Themeforest WP Theme
content: Bold, beautiful, full of character and fully responsive – Volumes is a great asset to any creative freelancer or agency. An attractive showcase for you work packed full of features, a filterable portfolio, custom widgets, custom page templates and more.

title: Tribune - Wpzoom Premium Wordpress Theme
content: Tribune is a revolutionary WPZOOM theme, offering users a professional and elegant display of articles and full control over theme features.

title: NewsWorld - DeluxeThemes Premium Wordpress Theme
content: NewsWorld is our most recent News WordPress theme. It is a very unique, one of a kind theme that allows you to run an advanced news portal in minutes.This theme comes with very unique features.

title: Max Mag - Responsive WP Magazine Themeforest Theme
content: A feature-rich, professional media and magazine theme. Max Mag is fully-responsive and includes unlimited color schemes, a sticky menu bar, a slider on each category page, 5 different ad units, including a wallpaper ad, a drag-and-drop homepage, 15 custom widgets, secondary feature headlines, SEO friendly and so much more.

title: Marisa - A WordPress Magazine Themeforest Theme
content: Marisa is a simple, clean and beautiful WordPress magazine theme with great features, such as the built in review system that lets you review whatever you want and gives you up to 5 rating criteria. Furthermore you can add a Buy now button which you can use for example an affiliate link. The theme comes with 2 skins, a light & dark. You can easily customize the main and secondary colors of the theme inside the custom Theme Options.

title: FlipFlop - Woothemes Wordpress Theme
content: Flipflop is a responsive, ultra-readable theme geared around news publishers. With impressive column generator functionality for posts and pages, clean, large typography, a modular homepage that can be re-arranged thanks to widget components & a featured slider Flipflop has all the tools to customize this theme for whatever niche.

title: NewsPro Magazine - Gabfire Premium Wordpress Theme
content: NewPro Magazine is a multipurpose WordPress theme that suits for anyone running a news or magazine style website. The NewsPro Magazine has four column homepage layout with Ajax tabs that can be used as positions to highlight featured articles or custom widgets. The theme also comes with inbuilt Video and Photo Gallery modules.

title: Magazinum - Wpzoom Premium Magazine Theme
content: Magazinum is a stylish theme with an innovative design which is perfect for magazine websites of any topics, like: fashion, celebrities, movies and entertainment.
